```
#[derive(Accounts)]
#[instruction(bump: u8)]
pub struct InitHouse<'info> {
    #[account(mut)]
    pub vrf: AccountInfo<'info>,
    #[account(
        init,
        seeds=[b"house_state"],
        bump=bump,
        payer=user
    )]
    pub house_state: AccountLoader<'info, HouseState>,
    #[account(mut)]
    pub house_vault: UncheckedAccount<'info>,
    #[account(mut)]
    pub user: Signer<'info>,
    pub system_program: Program<'info, System>,
}
```
